Name: ROMBY
About the game: In ROMBY you will earn points by placing 4 and even more figures of one color in a straight line. Earn more points and open all hidden girls. Trust me it won't be easy. - Every round is unique - Fast and fun gameplay - Great soundtrack - Global rating and achievements - Lots of missions - Girls
